Similarly, if the urgency of business or the completion of any project deadlines requires the investment of extra time and energy, you should be willing to work on Saturdays as well.

div.p: In the event where, at the discretion of the Management, you are assigned to be part of any Global Projects, you shall be required to work closely with the Onsite team to meet the Project deadlines and deliverable milestones. In such circumstances, the working days and hours shall be in accordance with the onsite Project team, and Friday and Saturday shall be weekend holidays.

The employment shall be on a permanent basis, and contract termination will be subject to three months' notice in writing either by the employee or one month's notice by the Company. In case of termination, you will be given an Air ticket to your place of hire, if the place of hire is other than the UAE.

6. Medical: Medical Insurance for self will be provided by the Company as per the policy.

7. Leave Travel: The Company will provide AED 1,250/- towards return economy class air passage for self at the end of the contract (eligible after completion of one year of continuous service) if you are not a native of UAE.

8. Assessment: Performance Appraisals will be done at the end of each financial year for rewards and compensation. Anyone who joins the company six months prior to the financial year-end shall be eligible for such appraisals.

ul.li: Annual Leave: 30 days annual leave will be accrued from the date of joining on a pro-rata basis. Annual leave can be availed only after six months of joining. Annual leave can be taken up to a maximum of 30 days at a time.

Sick Leave: You are entitled to a Sick Leave as per UAE Labor Law. Sick leave is subject to approval based on evidence of treatment submitted. If the evidence submitted is not satisfactory, Management has the discretion to approve or reject the sick leave. If the sick leave is rejected, it will be adjusted against the annual leave. In such cases, if there is no balance in Annual Leave accrued, the sick leave submitted will be treated as leave without payment.
Maternity Leave: 45 days of paid leave and 15 days of half-pay leave will be available for eligible associates or what is prescribed under UAE Labor Law for Private Sector employees will be extended.
Paternity Leave: 5 days of paid maternity leave will be extended for eligible associates.
Public Holidays: Public holidays declared for the private sector by the Government of UAE will be extended to our associates.

div.p: The sanction of any kind of leave, other than the above, shall depend exclusively upon the urgency and exigencies of work and such sanction shall be granted or withheld at the sole discretion of the Management. For getting such leave or for an extension of the leave granted, you shall be required to seek written permission in advance and before the commencement/expiry of the leave, from the Management in charge, by submitting an application stating the reasons therefore and your address during the leave period.

The employee shall apply for any leave only through the Leave Portal in the HRM System and only the leave as may be approved by the Management shall be deemed as validly granted. If at any time the reasons given by you for availing such leave are found to be false, you will be liable for dismissal from the services of the company. It is mandatory that Management approval is obtained prior to availing any leave in cases other than sick leave. Line manager should be informed about any sick leave, if required. Failure to obtain prior approval through the HRM System and any absence thereto shall be deemed as unauthorized absence and treated as Loss of Pay. All sick leave applications shall be submitted along with Medical Certificate issued by an authorized Medical Practitioner approved by the Ministry of Health. Compensatory leave is at the discretion of the Management and it must be approved prior to the availing of such leave.

p.span: You are expected to maintain utmost secrecy with respect to the affairs of the company and shall be bound to maintain the confidentiality of any information, whether written or oral, which relates to the internal businesses or financial affairs, know-how, inventions or any client, agent, contractor or vendor. You shall not disclose the identities of clients, executives and/ or other sensitive information to anyone outside Klystron Global. This includes financial and other sensitive information of any of the company’s clients that you may have access to by virtue of your employment with Klystron Global. Breach of this provision shall be treated as a gross violation of the terms herein and upon violation, your services shall be liable to be terminated forthwith.

Code of Conduct: During your employment with Klystron, you are required to follow a code of conduct in keeping with our business requirements and company philosophy. This includes appropriate dress code, use of proper language (written, verbal and non-verbal), email, telephone/cell phone etiquette and decorum to be always observed in the office and with clients. During office hours, you are expected to devote your whole-hearted time and attention to the business needs of the organization and agree not to pursue or conduct any personal business.

div.p: The employer expects all employees to always maintain the highest standard of professional conduct and the following leads to misconduct during employment.

ul.li: Irregular attendance of repeated or excessive absence, tardiness or early departure /late coming without approval.
Unreported or unapproved absence (including overstay of leave) for more than five consecutive days or deviation from assigned and accepted schedule for more than five days.
Falsification or manipulation in background verification process or employment records, employment information or other records prior to or after joining the employer.
Neglect of normal duties and functions
Practice such as reading personal materials during work time.
Continues discharge of work function that do not meet the standards reasonably expected.
Breach of confidentiality provisions
Installing, downloading, copying, or duplicating any unauthorized or unlicensed software or programs, games, or attachments on any computer system of the employer
Engaging in illegal activities
Workplace violence including threats of physical violence
Causing damage to the property of the employer, any Klystron clients, or their respective personnel
Theft of any property belonging to another, the employer or their respective personnel, clients, or visitors
Corruption, fraud, or misappropriation of funds
Failure to comply with policies, guidelines, rules, and regulations of the employer
Excessive personal use of the employer’s telephone, fax, or computer systems
Any act prejudicial to or in conflict with the interests of the employer

p.span: Your position with the company calls for whole time employment and you will devote yourself exclusively to attend to the business requirements of the company. You will not take up any other work for remuneration (part time or otherwise) or work on an advisory capacity or be interested directly or indirectly (except as a shareholder) in any other trade or business that competes with Klystron directly or indirectly, during your employment with the company, without the prior written permission from the company.

div.p: Use of Resources/ Assets: You shall use the company’s resources/assets only for official purposes.

ul.li: You shall conduct yourself with utmost decorum and shall efficiently and honestly discharge and perform all duties and functions related to your employment as also such duties as you may be required to perform by the company from time to time, consistent with your employment in relation to the business of the company.

Your duty hours shall be fixed by the Management from time to time according to the needs and exigencies of work and these are liable to be changed by the Management from time to time for which you shall have no objection.
You shall have no objection to work in any shift, whether day or night, as and when required to do so by the Management.

You may be posted from one client to another from time to time as may be required by the needs/exigencies of the company’s business. You may also be expected to serve on the premises of some of our clients. During your presence in the premises of any of our clients, you are expected to be most cordial. Any misbehavior on your part with any of our clients or their employees shall be considered as gross misconduct on your part leading to severe disciplinary action and/or summary dismissal as may be warranted by the circumstances of the case.

If under any circumstances, you have your own reservations to obey any order, it shall be obligatory upon you to first obey that order, and then thereafter represent your grievances to the Management.as the case may be. But no representation shall be entertained unless you have first carried out the orders given to you.

You shall not refuse to accept any communication delivered to you by hand by or on behalf of the Management. Such refusal on your part shall be considered as misconduct and lead to disciplinary action as may be warranted by the circumstances of the case.
Any order or notice pasted on the Notice Board of the company by the Management shall be deemed to have been personally served on you.

You shall never go on strike or stage/demonstration without giving 14 (fourteen) days’ advance notice and without placing your grievances, if any, before the Management and without first exhausting all the constitutional means and remedies available to you under the law. In any case, before raising any Industrial Dispute you shall first inform the HR department or person in charge of the HR and attempt to settle such dispute, if any, by mutual negotiations and/or arbitration.

When you are accused of any misconduct you are liable to be suspended from service pending enquiry against you. An order of suspension will be communicated to you or pasted on the Notice Board of the Company. During the period of suspension, you shall be paid subsistence allowance as per law. In case the charges are proved against you, you shall be dismissed from the services of the company and such dismissal shall be deemed to have taken effect retrospectively from the date of suspension. But in case you are exonerated from the charges you will be treated as on duty.
You should inform the company at once of any act of dishonesty and/or action prejudicial to the interest of the company on the part of any person, which may come to your knowledge.

Your service conditions shall be governed by this contract as also by the company’s Standing Orders, Rules and Regulations which are in force for the time being or as may be framed from time to time according to law.

You shall work under the supervision and guidance of your superior officers and under the directions of the Management given to you from time to time. You shall work conscientiously and diligently to the entire satisfaction of the Management of the company and to carry out the instructions of your superior or other superior officers in connection with the work allotted or assigned to you from time to time to the best of your skill and ability.

You shall be punctual and regular in the attendance of your duties and shall not absent yourself without prior permission of the Management. If you remain absent for any consecutive or continuous period of eight days or overstay for eight days after expiry of the sanctioned leave period, without permission or leave duty granted by the Management, it shall be deemed that you have voluntarily abandoned or resigned your services and accordingly your services shall automatically stand terminated and the lien on your appointment shall be deemed as lost after the expiry of the period of such unauthorized absence or overstay as the case may be.
You shall attend to work on close or off-days, and/or work overtime, as and when necessary due to urgency or exigencies of work in the opinion of your team lead or in the opinion of the Management.

You shall not, without previous written permission of the Company, carry on any business or enter for any part of your time, in any capacity the services of, or be employed by any other firm, company or person, you shall devote the whole of your time and attention exclusively to your duties to promote the interest and business of the company and shall not utilize or divulge to any other person or persons, firm or company, any of the company’s trade secret, knowledge or confidential affairs.

During the period of contract the company will be at liberty to terminate your employment at any time without assigning any reason whatsoever by giving 30 days’ written notice in that behalf or by paying a sum equivalent to 30 days’ salary and upon the expiration of such notice (whether the same will expire at the end of the month of service or at any other time whatsoever) or upon such payment being made by the company, as the case may be, your employment with the company shall cease forthwith and such termination shall be treated as discharge simpliciter.

You shall be at liberty to resign from the employment of the Company by giving 90 days’ prior written notice in that behalf. In the event of your leaving the employment of the company without giving notice as aforesaid, subject to the discretion of management, you shall be liable to forfeit a sum equivalent to 90 days’ salary, as the case may be, in lieu of such notice. Where the employee concerned, who opts to resign, is under any obligation to fulfill any responsibility undertaken to be delivered to any client within a definite timeline, the employee concerned who proposes to resign shall ensure that the notice to quit shall not affect such delivery timelines. In such cases, the acceptance of the notice to quit shall be considered appropriately, without causing any delay to the project delivery timelines agreed with the client.

Provided however, you shall, upon opting to leave the employment of the Company before completion of the initial contractual period of two years, desist from engaging in any service similar to the job you have been discharging under the services of the Company for a continuous period of two years with any of the Company’s competitors in the market. If a violation of the non-compete clause specified above is identified or comes to the knowledge of the Company, you shall be liable to pay such amount as may be equal to the undischarged period of the Contract with this Company.

Without prejudice to any of the rights and remedies which the company may have against you, the company will be entitled to terminate your employment forthwith without giving any notice whatsoever or payment in lieu thereof or without any compensation or benefits in case of any act of disobedience, acts subversive of discipline, insubordination, incivility, insobriety, dishonesty, irregular attendance or other serious misconduct or negligence on your part or incompetence in the discharge of your duty, or the breach by you of any of the terms of your employment or if you become bankrupt or are adjudged insolvent or on your compromising with your creditors. For this purpose, the company’s opinion as to whether any of the events mentioned therein has occurred will be final and binding on you and you will not be entitled to question the same on any ground whatsoever.
Notice period mentioned in this contract will not be valid if this service contract is terminated by the Employer within the Probation period.
Salary will be held during the notice period and released on the last working day after successfully completing the relieving formalities.
In the event of employee resigning within 180 days of receiving an increment or promotion, such Increase in compensation from the date of increase will be deducted from the final settlement.

In the event of employee resigning within 12 months of processing visa or renewal of an existing visa, the expenses incurred in onboarding will be deducted, up to a maximum of
6,000/- (UAE Dirhams Six Thousand only) from your final settlement.

p.span: All notices under this Agreement will be in writing or by e-mail and in proving service thereof it will be sufficient to show that such notice was properly addressed and posted.

ul.li: You shall be responsible for the safekeeping and return, in good condition and order, of all the Company’s records and property which may be or which may come in your use, custody or charge, or possession. In case of any damage or loss caused to any such record or property etc. due to your negligence, you will be liable to fully indemnify or compensate the Company for such damage or loss suffered as determined by the Management.

You shall keep the Company informed in writing within three days of any change in your residential address. Your last address as notified to the company shall be deemed to be the correct one for the purpose of communicating to you by the company.

The increment in your salary shall be dependent and based on your actual and regular performance of duty with efficiency, punctuality, discipline and to the satisfaction of the Management. Your increment will be withheld in case your performance of work is found unsatisfactory to the Management.

Your promotion (or demotion) shall be decided by the Management at its discretion, which will depend mainly upon your efficient, regular, and satisfactory attendance and performance of your work and services to the Company, maintenance of discipline and good behavior and your loyalty to the Company.
You shall retire from the services of the company automatically without any notice on your attaining the age of 58 years or earlier if you are found medically unfit.

div.p: In addition to the terms and conditions of employment herein above mentioned, you shall also observe, comply with, and be bound by any rules, regulations, and procedures which the company may from time to time separately frame for observance and compliance by its officers and which are communicated by the company to you in writing.

The Company shall have the right to add, alter, modify, or abrogate from time to time any term(s) of the contract of employment, including remuneration and perquisites, which shall be communicated to you either by individual letter or by a circular.

This appointment letter is being sent to you in duplicate for your acceptance. If the terms and conditions contained in this letter are acceptable to you, you are requested to send back to us the duplicate copy after putting your signature thereon signifying your acceptance thereof as “Understood and Accepted” at the foot of each page of this appointment letter.
Please note that once accepted you are bound by all the above terms and conditions of the contract.

div.h3: UNDERTAKING FOR NON-COMPETITION, NON-SOLICITATION AND NON-DISCLOSURE OF CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION ("Undertaking")
div.p:
On this date I, Mr.
undersigned employed by
(the 'Employer') in accordance with the attached employment contract dated ("Employment Contract") acknowledge that during my employment with the Employer, I hereby undertake:

1. Confidentiality: I acknowledge by virtue of my employment, I will acquire and be exposed to, have access to, make use of and/or create confidential information. Therefore, I agree to hold in trust and confidence all such confidential information. I will neither disclose any such confidential information to anyone outside Klystron Global without the prior approval of an authorized signatory, except as required by any authorized duties for the employer, nor use any such confidential information for any purpose other than for the benefit of Klystron Global. I agree that during my employment, I shall not use or disclose any confidential information or intellectual property of any former employer or other person or entity without the prior written authorization if such employer, person or entity and the prior written consent of an Authorized Signatory.

2. Authorized to access systems and electronic communication and use of Klystron property:
I understand that while employed with Klystron Global, I will use and have access to the systems, I also acknowledge that Klystron Global has the right at any time to access, retrieve, delete, monitor, examine, use and/or disclose my electronic communications and information from me and the content, without notice to me, and that such electronic communication are considered part of a Klystron Global business and client records and are not to be considered private or personal to me or any other personnel. I further acknowledge that this right extends to electronic communications transmitted for either a business or personal purpose. I agree that I am authorized to access the systems only for the approved business purposes and occasional personal use if such use does not interfere with my work responsibilities and other required business activities, business operation, or systems performance. However, I also acknowledge that such occasional personal use does not create an expectation of privacy as to any of my personal electronic communication. I am not authorized to download confidential information or other information to removable media such as CD-ROM, disk, USB other than as authorized for furthering the business objectives of Klystron Global. I hold myself responsible for the safe keeping and return in good condition of property that may be in my use, custody, care, or charge. For the loss of any Klystron Global property in my possession or custody or which I have been assigned responsibility, the employer will have a right to assess on its own basis and recover from me, the damage in respect of such material (out of amount due to me or otherwise) and to take such other legal actions as it deems appropriate including termination of my employment without notice or payment in lieu thereof in the event of my failure to account for such material or property to its satisfaction. Any breach on the above will be treated as criminal offense and would lead to penal or disciplinary action.

ul.li: a) I agree that the employer owns all rights, title, and interest in and to all works.

b) I agree that all works are deemed works made for hire under UAE copyright or applicable laws or equivalent laws of any applicable foreign jurisdiction, and all intellectual property rights therein vest automatically in the employer upon creation of works. I agree that to the extent any work is held not to be a work made for hire, I hereby irrevocably assign all intellectual property rights in the work to the employer, notwithstanding anything contained in the UAE copyright act.
c) I agree that such assignments shall continue to be in force for perpetuity irrespective of whether the employer exercises its right as the assignee for any period.

d) I will at all times even after termination of my employment, do whatever the employer reasonably requests of me at the employer's expense to document the assignment of any works to the employer or to assist the employer in pursuing, renewing, extending, or assigning any intellectual property rights, and otherwise perfecting, protecting, and enforcing said intellectual property rights in any works. I agree that as between me and the employer, the employer shall be the sole author, inventor, and owner of all such works and intellectual property rights therein throughout the world, and that the employer shall have the sole right to seek copyright registration, patents, or trademark registration, including all extensions and renewals thereof.

e) I agree to keep and maintain adequate and current records (in the form of notes, sketches or drawings and in any other form that may be required by the employer) of all the works developed by me during the period of employment with the employer, which records shall be available and always remain the sole property of the employer.

p.span: Upon termination of my employment for any reason, I will cooperate with Klystron Global in all matters relating to the completion of pending work and its orderly transfer. I will also cooperate fully with Klystron Global in connection with any threat of or actual legal proceeding against Klystron Global or any client, customer, or licenser of Klystron Global arising out of any matter with or of which I had contact or knowledge during my employment.

During the period of my employment, I will not directly or indirectly participate in or in any way render services or assistance to any business that is or may be competitive with Klystron Global, whether or not for compensation, which might result in or create the appearance of using my position for private gain or other than for the benefit of Klystron Global. I shall use the company’s resources only for official purposes.

6. I accept and agree to abide by all the aforesaid terms and conditions as well as the Code of Conduct, organizational policies, and the Circulars issued or may be issued by the Company from time to time.

div.p: 7. I also agree

ul.li: a) To refrain from being employed, engaged, concerned, or interested in any organization directly or indirectly competing with the Employer in the practice of Technology services and solutions within Oman or UAE for a period of 12 months (not exceeding 12 calendar months) following the expiration or termination of the Employment Contract.

b) To refrain from directly or indirectly soliciting business from, or attempting to sell, license or provide the same or similar products or services as are provided to any customer or client of the Employer for...

c) To refrain from directly or indirectly soliciting, inducing, or attempting to induce or solicit any other employee of the Employer to terminate his/her employment with the Employer for a period of 12 months (not exceeding 12 calendar months) following the expiration or termination of the Employment Contract.

d) To respect the Employer’s confidential information (whether or not recorded in documentary form, or stored on any magnetic or optical disk or memory) relating to the Employer’s business, including but not limited to its products/services, customers, clients, price lists, suppliers, finances, patents, trademarks and trade secrets, and not (either during the course of my employment with the Employer or at any time after its termination) to use for my own purposes or those of any third party, disclose or communicate (or facilitate the disclosure or communication) to any person, company or organization, any confidential information acquired or discovered during the course of my employment with the Employer.

div.p: 8. I acknowledge that the restrictions set out above are necessary to protect the Employer's business interests, confidential information, customer connections, goodwill, and stability of the workforce.

9. If I breach any provision(s) of this Undertaking, I agree to pay the Employer damages equivalent to my monthly remuneration for each month or part of a month that I am in breach as compensation for the damages that will be sustained by the Employer because of the breach.

10. I agree that this Undertaking shall be governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates, and any dispute or claim arising out of or in connection to this Undertaking or breach thereof shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of Courts in UAE.

11. Each of the restrictions in this Undertaking is intended to be separate and severable and if any of the restrictions shall be adjudged void or ineffective for whatever reason but would be adjudged to be valid and effective if part of the wording were reduced in scope or deleted, the said restrictions shall apply with such modifications as may be necessary to make them valid and effective.

12. I agree that if I receive an offer from any third party to be involved in a business concern in any capacity either during my employment with the Employer or prior to the expiry of the restrictions set out above, I will provide the terms of this Undertaking to the person making the offer.

13. This Undertaking must be executed by the parties in accordance with any execution formalities required and/or permitted by the UAE Chamber of Commerce and Industries from time to time and may be executed in any number of counterparts, each of which, when executed and delivered, shall be an original, and all the counterparts together shall constitute one and the same instrument.
